snippet: HOCHMAN--Bert, died peacefully on February 17, surrounded by loving family. Born November 23, 1925, Bert graduated Boys High in Brooklyn and Brooklyn College, class of 1946. After college he joined the Brooklyn Eagle, rising from copy boy to Night City Editor. He worked in the public relations department at Lever Brothers from 1955 until retirement. Predeceased by sister Anita Rosenzweig. Bert was remarkably loyal, kind and disarmingly funny. He will be greatly missed by wife of 65 years, Estelle, son Steven, daughter Gail and grandchildren Emily and Jonathan Hochman, Jacob and Elena Levi. Services 11:15, Sunday, at "The Riverside" West 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in Bert's memory may be made to: The Michael J. Fox Foundation. 1/3
